string.name: name
string.value: A Sign of the Dragon Master's Return
If you're curious about #bDragon Master Evan#k, go see Cassandra in town.
#bCassandra#k says that she has some information for you regarding Dragon Master Evan. Go see her now.
You found out that the return of Dragon Master Evan is close at hand.
Have you heard about the #bDragon Master#k? No? Hehe, that's what I figured. If you're curious about #bDragon Master Evan#k, come talk to me.
You do know where I am right? I can be found in any of the major towns in Maple World.
I called you so that I could give you info about the #bDragon Master#k and give you a gift as a bonus but you don't want it? You're going to regret it...
